name: Caribbean Jerked Pork Tenderloins
keywords: chilies, pork, spices, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, main course

recipeInstructions.text: Grind the allspice berries in a spice grinder and transfer to a blender. Add the cinnamon, nutmeg, coriander, scallions, garlic, chili, rum, water, salt and pepper and blend until a smooth paste forms, scraping down the sides of the jar as needed. Place the pork tenderloins in a shallow baking dish. Wearing rubber gloves, rub the paste all over the pork. Refrigerate several hours or overnight.

Preheat broiler. Place the pork 4 inches under the broiler and broil, turning once, until pork is only slightly pink in the center, about 12 to 15 minutes. Let stand for 5 minutes. Cut into 1/4-inch-thick slices and serve.
